title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: Alphanews
summary:
AI与设计的融合进入深水区，设计工具智能化与设计理念AI化并行。

WWDC25上Liquid Glass设计语言的推出，不仅预示着UI设计风格的转变，更引发了对现有设计工具及工作流的深刻反思。从AI辅助代码编写到AI驱动设计决策，设计领域正在经历一场由内而外的智能化革命。这对于设计师而言，意味着需要拥抱AI，将其作为设计流程中的得力助手，而非竞争对手。

希望能给你带来启发。下面是详细内容： 日报官网：alphanews.club，任何问题可咨询kiki220238。

title: [PR] feat: Integrate redteam providers with defaults system
summary:
## Summary

Integrates redteam providers with the promptfoo defaults system to enable automatic provider selection based on available API credentials. This eliminates the need for explicit provider configuration in most cases while maintaining full backward compatibility.

### Key Features

- **Auto

title: [PR] Add Ollama provider support for local LLM inference
summary:
## Summary

This PR adds Ollama provider support, enabling the SRE Agent to work with local LLMs for complete privacy and offline operation. Perfect for local Kubernetes development and testing.

## Key Features

### 🦙 **Ollama Provider Implementation**
- **OllamaClient**: Full HTTP API integration
